name: react-boilerplate
description: A front-end template that helps you build fast, modern mobile web apps.

scripts.serve: npm run compile:css && npm run watch
scripts.watch: npm run watch:server & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:postcss & npm run watch:lint
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:js && npm run build:gzip && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:assets && npm run doc
scripts.build:html: html-minifier -c html-minifier.json app/index.html -o dist/index.html && replace '@@version' $npm_package_version dist/index.html
scripts.build:js: browserify app/src/index.js -t babelify -g envify -g [ uglifyify --screw-ie8 --mangle [ --toplevel --eval ] --compress [ --unsafe ] ] -cm > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:css: node-sass app/src/index.scss '.tmp/bundle.css' && postcss -u autoprefixer -c postcss.json -o 'dist/bundle.css' '.tmp/bundle.css' && cleancss -o dist/bundle.css dist/bundle.css
scripts.build:assets: ncp app/images/ dist/images/ & ncp app/fonts/ dist/fonts/ & ncp app/sounds/ dist/sounds/ & ncp app/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico & ncp app/humans.txt dist/humans.txt & ncp app/manifest.json dist/manifest.json & ncp app/manifest.webapp dist/manifest.webapp & ncp app/robots.txt dist/robots.txt & ncp app/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run doc

author: Thinkingbox
